name: Grilled Chicken and Pasta Salad
author: Ann Marie
summary: This salad is very filling and is used as a meal in my home. Everyone always loves it! It is also quick and easy. Note: I have also added olives, hard boiled eggs, and red bell pepper to this salad. Enjoy with your favorite dressing!
directions: Preheat the grill for high heat
Season both sides of chicken breast halves with steak seasoning
Grill chicken 6 to 8 minutes per side, or until juices run clear
Remove from heat, cool, and cut into strips
Meanwhile, place the rotini pasta in a large pot of lightly salted boiling water
Cook 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente
Drain, and rinse with cold water to cool
In a large bowl, mix together the cheese, onion, lettuce, and tomatoes
Toss with the cooled chicken and pasta to serve
